name: L'Agarderie: Soorvaïvol (level1)
description:
This is a small scene made with Godot Engine

The only goal: Soorvaïve

Its my very first software that i upload on the internet, everything has been entirely made by me (coding, sprites animation, sfx and music), so im open for feedback and suggestions concerning every aspect of this little demo
( please keep in mind im just a hobbyist that didnt go to a specific school to learn anything, my knowledge is limited to free tutorials that you can find online, so if you have any methods or programs to propose, i would be glad to hear about it ;)

Even though you can play with your keyboard, i highly suggest you to use a controller, in order to avoid "input ghosting" that could happen from your keyboard

The controls are the followings:
Move: Arrows/D_Pad
Run: Shift/RT
Jump: Space/A
Shoot: D/B
Hit: Q/X
Spawn Enemies: R/LT

You can only spawn enemies when you got them all while being in a "platformer state"
To be sure you can spawn enemies, the "remaining" text will turn green
